title: Strange Connection Issues
body:
So I have been having an issue in my games presently where I begin to lag, but my ping meter does't spike. I stay at a consistent 80 ping, which is my regular and I am fully accustomed to playing it, but usually once a game, rarely twice or thrice, hp bars will disappear, and animations will stop playing, but I can still move my champion, while no other entities move on screen. I've been thinking it's a packet loss issue, but the strange thing is that all of my input commands come through as normal, and if I am in a skype call, my partner is always able to roughly guide me out of danger.

I was wondering if I could get a second opinion on the issue from anyone, because ideally I'd like to troubleshoot the issue. c=

replies.body:
It honestly does seem like a packet loss issue like you suggested.  The difference is that when you have packet loss, it doesn't have to affect your entire connection.  It is quite possible you are getting packet loss to the individual game server for League, while being able to connect to Skype just fine.  You can actually double-check this with our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743)!  Because this happens consistently, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  There are a ton of steps there, but it should help to get your connection stable once more.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
